sentences.sContent: She’s been an outspoken feminist for over twenty years.
sentences.sCn: 20多年来，她一直是个直言不讳的女权主义者。

remMethod.val: femin(女人) + ist → 女权运动者

words.tran: 女权主义；女权运动；男女平等主义

trans.tranCn: 男女平等主义者, 女权扩张论者
trans.tranOther: someone who supports the idea that women should have the same rights and opportunities as men
